sentence.Network_en: The young man spoke so mundanely of university life.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个年轻人把大学生活讲得如此平淡.

list.abs: Yael : actually Don , writing was to keep track of more mundane things , like money .事实上，书写创制出来是用来保存更多现世的东西的痕迹，比如说钱。
billowing bustling place mundane world red dust surging in human society 滚滚: roll; billow; surge 红尘: the world of mortals; human.
Munchausen syndrome 求医癖mundane realism 现世实在论municipal 市政的
heavenly palace 天宫mundane life 凡间生活shoulder pole 扁担

sentences.sentence: "the young man spoke so mundanely of university life"

auth_sentence.content: They would establish a charitable trust and, more mundanely, there would be driving lessons for the children.
